markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Prophet](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3442)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The gods occasionally send messages in dreams to individuals who wander the lands. Some prophets have not received true divine missives but have misinterpreted normal dreams.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Prophet](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3442)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 30

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +8, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +1

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19), manifesto (functions as a [religious text](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2746)), pouch of rocks, robes

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 25

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flail +8 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +7 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 18, attack +10
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Know the Way](/Spells.aspx?ID=1582), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Enfeeble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1513), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (4 slots)

**Cleric Domain Spells** DC 18, 1 Focus Point
- **1st**
[Read Fate](/Spells.aspx?ID=445)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-534" />
name: Prophet
